definition: know and comprehend the nature or meaning of
details:
verb
- know and comprehend the nature or meaning of
= example: know and comprehend the nature or meaning of
- perceive (an idea or situation) mentally
= synonyms: see
- believe to be the case
= example: believe to be the case
= synonyms: infer
- make sense of a language
= example: make sense of a language
= synonyms: read
- be understanding of
= example: be understanding of
= synonyms: sympathize, sympathise, empathize, empathise
